definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: The microphotographs of SEM indicated the change of microcosmic morphology.
sentences.chinese: 掃描電子顯微鏡分析了表微觀形貌的變化。

sentences.english: Scanning electron microscope image of the compound eye of a noctuid moth.
sentences.chinese: 掃描電子顯微鏡圖像的複眼的夜蛾蛾。

sentences.english: Low power scanning electron microscope image of tooth surface, computer-coloured yellow on blue background.
sentences.chinese: 牙齒表面的電子顯微鏡掃描圖。

sentences.english: The electron microscope works by scanning the item inquestion extremely slowly.
sentences.chinese: 電子顯微鏡掃描有問題項目的速度非常慢。

sentences.english: Includes colorized photographs taken with an electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 包括用電子顯微鏡採取彩色照片。

sentences.english: Capturing an image with an electron microscope is a time consumingand expensive process.
sentences.chinese: 用電子顯微鏡捕捉一個圖像是耗時而昂貴的過程。

sentences.english: Methods for suppressing secondary electrons in neutron tubes are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 二次電子是掃描電子顯微鏡中最爲基礎和常用的信號。

sentences.english: These orange and blue balls represent electron microscope images of co-polymers.
sentences.chinese: 這些橘色和藍色的球描繪了聚合物的電子顯微鏡圖像。

sentences.english: With the electron microscope much greater magnification can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 使用電子顯微鏡，可以獲得大得多的放大率。

sentences.english: One can see the orderly texture of matter through an electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 通過電子顯微鏡可以看到物質的有序結構。

sentences.english: The final image in the electron microscope must be projected on to a phosphor-coated screen.
sentences.chinese: 電子顯微鏡的最終圖像一定要投射到熒光屏上。

sentences.english: That electric microscope could magnify a object 1million times.
sentences.chinese: 那架電子顯微鏡可以把物體放大一百萬倍。

sentences.english: Scanning electron micrograph of the end of a bee's (Apis sp.) abdomen showing the stinger
sentences.chinese: 彩色掃描電子顯微鏡下的蜜蜂腹部的刺。

sentences.english: The stones were analyzed with infrared spectrophotometer or scanning electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 結石之分析是採用紅外線分光儀及掃描電子顯微鏡。

sentences.english: The pearls and pearl layers in pearl-shells were studied with transmission electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 用透射電子顯微鏡研究了珍珠和珍珠貝珍珠層。
